data.name: Project Star Head
data.detailed_description:
Overview

Project Star Head is a physics platformer, where you play as a little robot that can throw and teleport to its head.

Level Design

Use your physics-bending magic to manipulate various puzzles and defeat a variety of enemies all inspired by fundamental physics and algebraic concepts.

Bosses

Either go head to head with some of the most insane boss battles you will face in a head-throwing physics platformer or find a new creative way to out-wit these adversaries.


[#Note From Developer]
Most of the content you see here will be updated in the future with polished visuals, logos, and eventually a trailer. By wish-listing this game, I hope you will enjoy the gradual changes to this page as development continues. Thank you for your interest!

data.short_description: A sci-fi head-throwing physics platformer with platforming puzzles and adversaries inspired by scientific and math concepts.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Additional Notes: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Sound Card: Apple officially supported drivers. For
